description: This Java source file defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application, providing basic utility endpoints such as root greeting, documentation redirection, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A Spring REST controller that provides utility endpoints such as greeting, documentation redirect, health check, and info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message string for the root endpoint.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to the Swagger UI documentation page, constructing the URL dynamically based on the incoming request.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple 'OK' string indicating application health status.
